entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stewart Airport 07:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -18.5°C
Wind: N 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 11.
